channel.title: The Djekian Crusaders
channel.itunes:subtitle: A D&D 5e Actual Play Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Lunar Light Studio
channel.description: The biweekly adventures of Swigahct, Tynus, Noelle, and Vincent, as DM'ed by Drega. We also post recordings from Holybots's campaign, starring Zavei, Carmune, Viktor, Latro, and Pyre.

item.title: The Djekian Crusaders: Episode 2 - Part 1
item.description:
The Djekian Crusaders is an actual play D&D podcast. We're not for profit or anything, just looking to archive our adventures.

In this episode, the party enters the seaside fort under cover of night and makes some unexpected discoveries. Swigahct reaches a breaking point. Vincent ruins someone’s dinner. Tynus commits identity theft. Noelle strongly considers adoption.

NOTE: You will need the .png files in the Google Drive link below; do not open the image files until specified in the episode. https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B1uOwcfVhOLxRTdiVXo4c0xUSlk
https://djekiancrusaders.tumblr.com/

Your players are:
@dregadude (Drega) - DM @jeesideslug (Jee) - Swigacht, Half-Orc Barbarian @sandstriker (Sand) - Vincent, Tabaxi Gunslinger @bird-cult (Bird) - Tynus, Aarakocra Ranger @bluespacequeen (Blue) - Noelle, Human Cleric
item.itunes:author: Lunar Light Studio

item.title: The Djekian Crusaders: Episode 1 - Part 2
item.description:
The Djekian Crusaders is an actual play D&D podcast. We're not for profit or anything, just looking to archive our adventures.

In this first episode, our heroes meet the king and our players meet each other's characters for the first time. They promptly make for the seaside fortress, and have a tense forest encounter. Swigacht hits the road. Vincent realizes his aim could use some work. Tynus exhibits shocking competence. Noelle tries her hand at lawlessness. Enjoy!

https://djekiancrusaders.tumblr.com/

Your players are:
@dregadude on Tumblr (Drega) - DM @jeesideslug (Jee) - Swigacht, Half-Orc Barbarian
@sandstriker (Sand) - Vincent, Tabaxi Gunslinger @bird-cult (Bird) - Tynus, Aarakocra Ranger @bluespacequeen (Blue) - Noelle, Human Cleric
